comments.body: While technically correct, it's hard to understand what this sentence means...
Maybe you can expand the paragraph at the bottom a little more to explain what it means that that padding is maintained, e.g. that content doesn't suddenly drop just because the keyboard popped up.
I've updated this. Is the paragraph below a better explanation?
That's better. I like it. Maybe add at the end that setting this to true will avoid the UI shift to be extra explicit.

How about

```
final EdgeInsets padding = maintainBottomViewPadding ? MediaQuery.of(context).padding : MediaQuery.of(context).viewPadding;
```
